top_findings.summary: Contingent Business Interruption (CBI) Coverage

top_findings.summary: Indemnity Policies and Their Impact

These policies differ in terms of how long they continue to pay out, with Limited Indemnity only paying until the damage is repaired or property is replaced, while Extended Indemnity continues paying until the business resumes normal operations.
